select gi.group_no, gi.group_name, gi.group_img, gi.content, pg.cnt from user_info u join user_interest ui on u.userid = ui.userid join group_info gi on ui.catecode = gi.catecode left join ( select group_no, count(post_no) as cnt from post_group group by group_no ) pg on gi.group_no = pg.group_no where gi.enabled = 1 and u.userid = #{userid} order by pg.cnt desc limit 4

select gi.group_no, gi.group_name, gi.group_img, gi.content, pg.cnt from user_info u join group_info gi on u.first_area = gi.area_code or u.second_area = gi.area_code left join ( select group_no, count(post_no) as cnt from post_group group by group_no ) pg on gi.group_no = pg.group_no where gi.enabled = 1 and u.userid = #{userid} order by pg.cnt desc limit 4
